1: <pb/><t>Aleluya! <pb/>Cheb'ichaaq junaq ak' b'ich cho'q re li Qaawa',</t> <t>chek'ehaq xloq'al sa' xch'utameb' li neke'rahok re!</t>
2: <t>Chisaho'q sa' eech'ool chejunilex aj Israel:</t> <t>a'an laj yoob'tesihom eere.</t> <t>Sahoqex laa'ex ralal xk'ajol Si√≥n,</t> <t>xb'aan naq a'an leeRey!</t>
3: <t>Chenimaaq li xk'ab'a' rik'in xajok,</t> <t>chexb'ichanq ut chexwajb'aq rik'in tun ut aarp!</t>
4: <t>Xb'aan naq li Qaawa' naxra li xtenamit</t> <t>ut naroxloq'iheb' li tuulan rik'in li kolb'a ib'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Chinimaaq xloq'al li Yos xb'aaneb' li neke'rahok re;</t> <t>toj sa' li xch'aateb' che'xjap re xb'aan xsahilaleb' xch'ool.</t>
6: <t>Che'xterq'usi xk'ab'a' rik'in xtz'uumal reheb'</t> <t>ut chiwanq sa' ruq'eb' li ch'iich' ka'pak'al xq'esnal:</t>
7: <t>re naq twanq eeqajunk sa' xb'eeneb' li poyanam,</t> <t>jo'wi' te'rahob'tesiiq li maak'a'eb' xpaab'aal;</t>
8: <t>re xk'eeb'al sa' tz'alam chixjunileb' li awab'ej,</t> <t>ut xb'ak'b'aleb' rik'in chapleb' ch'iich' li neke'taqlank reheb';</t>
9: <t>re naq taatz'aqloq ru li tz'iib'anb'il sa' li raqb'a aatin.</t> <t>A'an xnimal xloq'al cho'q reheb' chixjunil laj paab'anel. <pb/>Aleluya!<f>[379]</f></t>
